ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE douploadplu_unidrv *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ * Project.........: LP15_Eth.pjx * Library.........: LP15_Eth_v1.vcx * Class.Module....: frmUpload.DoUploadPLU_UniDrv * Called by.......: <NA> * Parameters......: <none> * Returns.........: <none> * Notes...........: Çàãðóçêà òîâàðîâ â âåñû *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ WITH ThisForm *03.05.2008 14:29 -> Ïîäãîòîâèì ôàéë ñ äàííûìè .PrepareData(thisform.nTvrSetID) *03.05.2008 09:22 -> Îïðåäåëÿåì êîëè÷åñòâî çàïèñåé çàãðóæàåìûõ â âåñû SELECT RawPLU *** lnPLUTotalCount = RECCOUNT() *** IF lnPLUTotalCount = 0 .WriteLogMessage([Äàííûå äëÿ âåñîâ íå ãîòîâû.]) RETURN .F. ENDIF WAIT WINDOW 'Óñòàíàâëèâàåì ñîåäèíåíèå ñ âåñàìè ...' NOWAIT LOCAL lnScale lnScale = .Scale1 .Scale1 = .Null. .Scale1 = CreateObject('ADDIN.LP45') .Scale1.CurrentDeviceNumber = lnScale **WAIT WINDOW lnScale **.Scale1.showProperties() .Scale1.DeviceEnabled = .t. **WAIT WINDOW .Scale1.CurrentDeviceNumber *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ WITH Thisform.Scale1 .FirstRecord = 1 .LastRecord = RECCOUNT('RawPLU') *!* .FirstRecord = 21 *!* .LastRecord = 30 LOCAL lnCountRec lnCountRec = 0 .BeginAdd() WAIT WINDOW 'Çàãðóæàåì âåñû èíôîðìàöèåé î òîâàðå ...' NOWAIT SCAN ALL .PLU = RawPLU.Plu &&TvrID .Price = RawPLU.TvrPrice/100 .ICode = RawPLU.TvrID .Name = SUBSTR(ALLTRIM(RawPLU.TvrNM_L1),1,28) .Name2 = SUBSTR(ALLTRIM(RawPLU.TvrNM_L2),1,28) .Life = RawPLU.TvrLife .Tare = RawPLU.TvrTare .GCode = ThisForm.GrpTvr &&'21' &&RawPLU.TLUGrp .WareType = 0 &&(0 - âåñîâîé òîâàð, 1 - øòó÷íûé òîâàð)
.SetRecord() lnCountRec = lnCountRec + 1 *!* IF lnCountRec >3 && îòìåíà äåìî-ðåæèìà *!* EXIT *!* ENDIF *!* SET STEP ON *!* lnCountRec = 0 *!* .EndAdd *!* .DeviceEnabled = .f. *!* thisform.Scale1 = .null. *!* thisform.Scale1 = CreateObject('ADDIN.LP45') *!* .CurrentDeviceNumber = lnScale *!* .DeviceEnabled = .t. *!* .BeginAdd *!* ENDIF ENDSCAN .EndAdd If .ResultCode <> 0 =MESSAGEBOX(.ResultDescription) EndIf .DeviceEnabled = .f. thisform.Scale1 = .null. ENDWITH ENDWITH *03.05.2008 09:19 -> Çàêðîåì è óäàëèì âðåìåííóþ òàáëèöó USE IN IIF(USED([RawPLU]),[RawPLU],0) *** IF FILE([tmp\RawPLU.dbf]) ERASE tmp\RawPLU.dbf ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ WAIT CLEAR RETURN

WITH This
*15.09.2005 12:23 -> Âûïîëíèì ìåòîä ðîäèòåëüñêîãî êëàññà DODEFAULT() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*19.09.2005 15:20 -> Ïðî÷èòàåì ïàðàìåòð "Èãíîðèðîâàòü íåêîððåêòíûå ñòðîêè ïðè çàãðóçêå âåñîâ" .chkErrorIgnore.Value = VAL(oRes.GetParamIni([PARAM],[ERROR_IGNORE],FULLPATH([DRIVER.INI]))) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ *03.05.2008 15:20 -> Ïðî÷èòàåì ïàðàìåòð "Íîìåð âåñîâ â óíèâåðñàëüíîì äðàéâåðå" .Scale1 = VAL(oRes.GetParamIni([PARAM],[SCALEID],FULLPATH([DRIVER.INI]))) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ *03.05.2008 15:20 -> Ïðî÷èòàåì ïàðàìåòð "Íîìåð âåñîâ â óíèâåðñàëüíîì äðàéâåðå" .GrpTvr = ALLTRIM(oRes.GetParamIni([PARAM],[GROUP],FULLPATH([DRIVER.INI]))) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*16.09.2005 10:10 -> Çàïèñûâàåì â Log ñîîáùåíèå .WriteLogMessage([************* ÍÀ×ÀËÎ ÑÅÑÑÈÈ *************]) *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE preparedata *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ * Project.........: LP15_Eth.pjx * Library.........: LP15_Eth_v1.vcx * Class.Module....: frmUpload.PrepareData * Called by.......: <frmUpload.DoUploadPLU> * Parameters......: <tnTvrSetID> * Returns.........: <lcUniqueFileName> - óíèêàëüíîå íàçâàíèå ôàéëà, â êîòîðîì ñîäåðæàòñÿ äàííûå äëÿ çàãðóçêè * Notes...........: Ïîäãîòîâêà äàííûõ äëÿ çàãðóçêè â âåñû *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ LPARAMETERS tnTvrSetID
*15.09.2005 16:27 -> Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcOldTalk, ; lcOldAlias, ; lcOldDeleted, ; lnDefDaysKeep, ; llMakerInSecStr,; _Param *** lcOldTalk = SET([TALK]) lcOldAlias = ALIAS() lcOldDeleted = SET([DELETED]) *** SET DATABASE TO BASIS SET DELETED ON *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*09.09.2005 17:26 -> Ïàðàìåòð "Ñðîê ãîäíîñòè" lnDefDaysKeep = 3 lnDefDaysKeep = VAL(oRes.GetParamIni([PARAM],[DAYS_KEEP],FULLPATH([DRIVER.INI])))
*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.09.2005 16:55 -> Ïàðàìåòð "Ïîêàçûâàòü ïðîèçâîäèòåëÿ âî âòîðîé ñòðîêå" llMakerInSecStr = .F. *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* * Âûáîð òîâàðîâ äëÿ çàãðóçêè *******************************************************************************
*09.09.2005 16:01 -> Ôîðìèðóåì ñïèñîê òîâàðîâ WAIT WINDOW [Ôîðìèðîâàíèå ñïèñêà òîâàðîâ äëÿ çàãðóçêè â âåñû...] NOWAIT NOCLEAR SET MESSAGE TO [Ôîðìèðîâàíèå ñïèñêà òîâàðîâ äëÿ çàãðóçêè â âåñû...] This.WriteLogMessage([Ôîðìèðîâàíèå ñïèñêà òîâàðîâ äëÿ çàãðóçêè â âåñû...]) *** SET TALK ON *** _PARAM = tnTvrSetID
SELECT vTvrToScale.PLU, ; vTvrToScale.TvrId, ; PADR(vTvrToScale.TvrNM_L1 ,30) as TvrNM_L1 ,; IIF(llMakerInSecStr,NVL(PADR(LEFT(vTvrToScale.TvrNM_L2,30),30),SPACE(30)),PADR(SUBSTR(vTvrToScale.TvrNM_L1,31,30),30)) AS TvrNM_L2, ; vTvrToScale.TLU, ; vTvrToScale.TLUGrp,; NVL(vTvrToScale.TvrPrice*100,NTOM(0)) AS TvrPrice , ; vTvrToScale.TvrTareID,; 00 AS TvrTare,; lnDefDaysKeep AS TvrLife ; FROM vTvrToScale ; ORDER BY 1 ; INTO TABLE tmp\RawPLU
** MIN(NVL(TTOD(vTvrToScale.StockTvrExpiredDate),DATE()+lnDefDaysKeep))-DATE() AS TvrLife ; **WHERE vTvrToScale.TvrSetID = tnTvrSetID ;
*!* SELECT ; *!* TvrInSet.ListNumber AS PLU, ; *!* TvrInSet.TvrID, ; *!* PADR(LEFT(Tovar.TvrNM,28),28) AS TvrNM_L1, ; *!* IIF(llMakerInSecStr,NVL(PADR(LEFT(Client.CltNM,28),28),SPACE(28)),PADR(SUBSTR(Tovar.TvrNM,29,28),28)) AS TvrNM_L2, ; *!* TvrLookUp.TLU, ; *!* LEFT(TvrLookUp.TLU,2) AS TLUGrp, ; *!* NVL(Price.Price*100,NTOM(0)) AS TvrPrice, ; *!* 00 AS TvrTare, ; *!* lnDefDaysKeep-1 AS TvrLife ; *!* FROM TvrInSet ; *!* INNER JOIN Tovar ON Tovar.TvrID = TvrInSet.TvrID ; *!* LEFT JOIN Client ON Client.CltID = Tovar.MakerCltID ; *!* INNER JOIN TvrLookUp ON TvrLookUp.TLUID = TvrInSet.TLUID ; *!* LEFT JOIN Price ON Price.TvrID = Tovar.TvrID ; *!* WHERE TvrInSet.TvrSetID = tnTvrSetID AND Price.PrcTypeID = 1 ; *!* ORDER BY 1 ; *!* INTO TABLE tmp\RawPLU *** SET TALK OFF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*15.09.2005 17:37 -> Î÷èñòêà îêíà îò ñîîáùåíèé WAIT CLEAR SET MESSAGE TO [] *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*15.09.2005 17:38 -> Âîññòàíîâèì òåêóùèé Alias IF !EMPTY(lcOldAlias) AND USED(lcOldAlias) AND lcOldAlias#ALIAS() SELECT(lcOldAlias) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
